page.name: Doomed Dragon Amulet Scythe of Elementals
page.description: Eight elemental orbs to celebrate DragonFable's anniversary! Visit the Black Market Moglin to upgrade this weapon. This item requires a Dragon Amulet to use.

page.name: Ancient Dragon Amulet Scythe of the Elements
page.description: Forged by the Avatars in ages long past. Now available for DragonFable's anniversary! Allows element selection. Visit the Black Market Moglin to upgrade this weapon. This item requires a Dragon Amulet to use.

page.name: Ultimate Dragon Amulet Scythe of Elementals
page.description: Seven elemental choices for seven years of DragonFable! Thank you for helping support DF during our birthday month in 2013!
